Articles.Content:
Your goal is to build a vehicle which brings your computer to a crawl at relatively LOW partcount. Ideally it should also be able to bring other people's computer to a crawl too. So don't just try to run KSP on a potato. Make a craft that will turn i9s, Ryzens and RTXs into potatoes too on it's way to orbit.

 

There will be no score as such, but posting your rough computer specs, KSP settings, how long the flight actually took in real time, the partcount of your craft, and the ingame time to orbit should give a pretty good idea of how laggy it really is. It would also be nice of you to explain why you think your particular design has a high lag to partcount ratio and how you figured out it would.

 

Oh, and don't .cfg edit in a bunch of unnecessary extra modules or something. Make a craft you could actually build in the editor.

Edited May 16, 2021 by Pds314
